doc.title: Janggut Laksa: The Katong Laksa Story Part II
doc.text: It/PRP must/MD have/VB taken/VBN a/DT healthy/JJ dash/NN of/IN chutzpah/NN and/CC two/CD generous/JJ pinches/NN of/IN egotism/NN to/TO call/VBP a/DT few/JJ hairs/NNS growing/VB out/VB of/IN a/DT mole/NN on/IN your/PRP$ chin/NN a/DT Janggut/NN !/. Out/JJ of/IN curiousity/NN ,/, I/PRP asked/VBD my/PRP$ Malay/NN friends/NNS what/WP a/DT janggut/NN was/VBD ,/, and/CC they/PRP told/VBD me/PRP that/WDT it/PRP is/VBZ supposed/JJ to/TO be/VB a/DT beard/NN !/. You/PRP know/VBP ,/, the/DT type/NN that/IN Osama/NN Bin/NN Laden/NN grows/VBZ ./. Now/JJ ,/, we/PRP Chinamen/VBD ,/, especially/RB those/RB of/IN Southern/NNP decent/JJ just/RB ca/MD n't/RB grow/VB a/DT mohair/JJ rug/NN on/IN our/PRP$ faces/NN ,/, so/RB I/PRP guess/VBP some/JJ men/NNS might/VB want/VB to/TO brag/VB about/IN the/DT silky/JJ six/CD inches/NN of/IN silver/NN filaments/NN which/WRB they/PRP can/MD pill/VB roll/NN between/IN their/PRP$ thumb/NN and/CC finger/NN while/NN chuckling/NN over/IN a/DT cup/NN of/IN tea/NN ./. They/PRP went/VBD into/IN a/DT two/CD year/NN hiatus/NN before/IN re-emerging/NN in/IN Far/NNP East/NNP Square/NNP ./. But/CC by/IN then/RB they/PRP had/VBD lost/NN momentum/NN ./. Today/JJ ,/, Marine/JJ Parade/NN Laksa/NN has/VBZ rebranded/VBN itself/PRP as/IN Janggut/JJ Laksa/NN and/CC rightly/NN states/NN that/IN they/PRP are/VBP the/DT original/JJ Katong/NNP Laksa/NNP ,/, which/WDT paradoxically/VB has/VB its/PRP$ main/JJ stall/NN located/VBD in/IN Queensway/NNP Shopping/NNP Centre/NN ./.
